sqlMap.select: select sum(t2.amount) from t_center_out t1, t_center_base t2 where t1.fullid = t2.outid and t1.type = #type# and t1.location = #location# and t2.productId = #productId# and t1.outtime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outtime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 6, 7, 8)

select sum(t1.curcredit) from t_center_out t1 where t1.customerId = #customerId# AND t1.type = 0 AND t1.outtype = 0 AND t1.pay = 0 AND t1.outTime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outTime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8)

select sum(t1.staffcredit) from t_center_out t1 where t1.stafferId = #stafferId# AND t1.type = 0 AND t1.outtype = 0 AND t1.pay = 0 AND t1.outTime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outTime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8)

select count(t2.productId) from t_center_out t1, t_center_base t2 where t1.fullid = t2.outid and t1.type = 0 and t2.productId = #productId# and t1.outtime >= #beginDate# AND t1.outtime <= #endDate# AND t1.status in (1, 6, 7, 8)
